snippet.title: Alien: Isolation 'Nostromo Edition' Trailer
snippet.description:
Click To Subscribe! ► http://bdisgusting.com/15vI9Fe
Bloody Disgusting Twitter ► http://bdisgusting.com/16h6WIJ
Adam's Twitter ► http://bdisgusting.com/1aVb3mg

A new trailer for Alien: Isolation that details the special content included in the Nostromo Edition, which is available as a free upgrade for those who preorder the game. Otherwise, you can wait for SEGA to make it available as DLC.
